title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, December 9, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of poet John Milton (1608), author of the epic poem “Paradise Lost.” We feature Milton’s poem “On His Blindness.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of poet John Milton (1608), author of the epic poem “Paradise Lost.” We feature Milton’s poem “On His Blindness.”
